subject: Project kickoff: availability next week
body:
Hi Mohak,

Can we schedule a 60-minute kickoff meeting next week to align on milestones and owners? I'm available Tue 10-12 or Wed 14-17 (UTC). Please propose times that work for you.

Thanks,
Alice

subject: Your weekly tech digest — November highlights
body: Top stories this week: AI benchmarks, developer tools, and community events. Read more inside.

subject: Open enrollment reminder: choose your benefits by Dec 1
body:
Hi,

This is a reminder to complete your benefits enrollment before Dec 1, 2025. Log in to the HR portal and confirm your selections. If you need help, reply to this email.

HR Team

subject: Your invoice for order #4921
body: Thank you for your purchase. Attached is the invoice for order #4921. Total charged: $89.99.

subject: Request: please prepare a quote for Q1 contract
body:
Hi Mohak,

We need a quote for support services for Q1. Could you prepare an itemized quote by next Wednesday (2025-11-27)? Also include hourly rates and SLAs. Thanks, John.

subject: You won! Claim your prize now
body: Congratulations! You are selected to receive a prize. Click the link and enter your details.

subject: Action required: merge the payment fix by EOD
body: Please merge the fix for the payment API into main and deploy to staging by EOD today. Testing notes are in the PR. Ping me when done.

subject: Invitation: DevOps meetup on 3rd December
body: You're invited: DevOps meetup on 2025-12-03 at 18:00 in Bangalore. RSVP to secure a seat.

subject: Can you review these slides before Friday?
body: Hi — I attached draft slides for the client pitch. Can you review and comment by Friday (2025-11-28)? Focus on the timeline and estimated costs. Thanks!

subject: Dinner this weekend?
body: Hey! A few of us are going for dinner on Saturday at 8pm. You in?

subject: ALERT: High error rate on api/v1/orders
body: We observed an increase in 500 responses on /api/v1/orders between 02:00 and 02:10 UTC. Error rate ~12%. Please investigate and report findings.

subject: Interview scheduling — Frontend Engineer
body:
Dear Mohak,

We'd like to schedule a 40-minute interview for the Frontend Engineer role. Are you available Tue 2025-11-25 09:00 or Wed 2025-11-26 16:00 (IST)? Let us know which slot works.

Regards,
Recruiting team

subject: Suspicious login detected
body: We detected a login from a new device on 2025-11-16 at 20:55 IST. If this was not you, please secure your account immediately.

subject: Weekly status update (action: add your tasks)
body: Team — Please update your weekly status in the tracker with tasks completed and planned by Friday. Include blockers and ETA for major items.

subject: Maintenance scheduled: 2025-12-05 02:00-03:00 UTC
body: We will perform maintenance on 2025-12-05 between 02:00 and 03:00 UTC. Expect a brief interruption to some services.
